entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 10:23 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: N 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
